name: Alice's Mom's Rescue (itch)
description:
Alice's Mom's Rescue is an indie puzzle / platformer game in the pure style of retro pixel art.
The giant raven has captured Alice's mother.
Help Alice save her mother through the 3 worlds and 25 levels!
Change Alice's height by jumping on the magic mushrooms to get through the tiny spaces.
But be aware that a small size will also affect Alice's physical abilities!
Solve puzzles, beware of the evil cats, birds, bats & spikes, and find the right path to victory!

Update: The PC Windows version now include a SpeedRun mode with best time ranking + 3 difficulty mode !

The game is available in English, French, German, Spanish and Italian languages !

Compatibility:
-PC Windows (XP or 7)
-PC Linux (32bits library needed: libopenal, freeglut3, libwebp; tested on Ubuntu 14 32bits)
-Atari Falcon CT60 (Joystick or keyboard)
-Firebee (USB keyboard only)
-Atari Jaguar CD (CDI file to burn on a CD-R using DiscJuggler)

The Joypad is supported on the Windows version, but have been dropped on the Linux version due to unrecoverable errors.
